hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash cd $HOME/HOME/Unc85_Refonte; USER=uncwgeep PASS=mCtvuFqz HOST=ftp.cluster015.ovh.net
wget -mnH --cut-dirs=1 ftp://$USER:$PASS@$HOST/www -X www/.git
git add . -v git commit -m 'Sauvegarde journaliere' | true git push origin master -f | true
WPNAME='unc85_refonte' WPDBVERSION=`cat wp-includes/version.php | grep "wp_version =" | cut -d \' -f 2` WPPLUGIN=`find wp-content/plugins/ -type d -maxdepth 1 | cut -f3 -d '/'` URL='https://www.unc85.com/' TYPE='wordpress' SERV='' FAVICON='https://www.unc85.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/unc85.png' curl http://aloa:Palmier-10@monit.aloa.ovh/RapportsMonitoring/post.php -X POST -d "type=$TYPE&name=$WPNAME&version=$WPDBVERSION&plugin=$WPPLUGIN&url=$URL&serveur=$SERV&favicon=$FAVICON"
declare -u UPPER_LF="Unc85_Refonte" mkdir -p $HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF ~/.timotheeBin/phploc wp-content/themes > $HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF/rapport_phploc.txt ~/.timotheeBin/phpmetrics wp-content/themes --report-html=$HOME/HOME/_Rapports/$UPPER_LF/rapport_phpmetrics
